transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Haan ji sir, sir Ramesh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Ek minute rukiyega. 
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Main aapko link share kar deta hu. 
Executive: Ek na sir apne phone mein pehle number save kar lo sir.
Customer: Bolo ji. 
Executive: Ek number save karo 8048.
Customer: Tum to 1 baje free hone wale the.
Executive: Meeting ki maine bola tha na sir agar meeting cancel ho jayegi to main aa jaunga sir. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: 8018 WhatsApp kiya hai sir ye number save kar lena ye na kabhi bhi IndiaMART se koi customer aapko call karega na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapko pata chal jayega ki customer ka call aaya tha. 
Customer: Achcha. 
Executive: WhatsApp pe dala hai maine WhatsApp pe dala isko save kar lena sir aap, theek hai? 
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Abhi main aapko dikha deta hu maine WhatsApp kiya link dekho sir. 
Customer: Hmm, wo bhi aa gaya. 
Executive: Achcha ye hai na 80482502 60. 
Executive: Ah, is number se hamesha call aayegi 80. 
Customer: Achcha, ye aapka kya likh dunga isme naam kya likh dunga?
Executive: Ispe likh do IndiaMART customer name likh do sir. 
Customer: Sir ek minute line pe rehna. 
Executive: Haan haan. 
Executive: Hello. 
Executive: Ramesh sir? 
Customer: Haan haan. 
Executive: Ek minute line pe rahiyega, theek hai? 
Customer: Theek hai ji.
(silence)
[music]
Executive: Haan ji Ramesh sir. 
Customer: Ji. 
Customer: Haan sir aap link pe aao na. 
[music]
Executive: Sir, oh sorry. 
Executive: Haan Ramesh sir maine haan join kijiye sir. 
Customer: Lo ji abhi join kar raha hu. 
Customer: Hamare to customer yaar haan keh jaa baad lapata hai jaa rahe. 
Executive: Kya kar rahe?
Customer: Phone pe haan kar de kal sham ek ne haan kar diya tha ki kal subah 10 baje batata hu. 
Customer: Wo phone nahi utha raha na message ka pata. 
Executive: Haan. Hota hai sir hota hai hota hai aisa bahut hoga. 
Executive: Matlab ki aapko kya karna padega na use continuously follow karna padega WhatsApp pe message karne karna padega sir bataye kya hua fir dopahar mein phone kara fir sham mein phone kara hai na raat mein message kijiye sir. 
Executive: Kuch rate mein issue aa raha hai to bataye. 
Executive: Aise hi teen char din tak follow kijiye sir. 
Customer: Na wo phone utha raha na kuch bhi ye na phone kaatna padega iska. 
Executive: Hota hai sir. Haan haan phone kaat dijiye main isse connect kar leta hu.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer mentioned about disappearing customers.

Resolution:

- Executive suggested following up with customers.

- Executive shared a WhatsApp number to save.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, customer, whatsapp number
